text:
Skill beats size. Heart beats doubt. Discipline beats everything.

From Olympic gold to undisputed cruiserweight and then undisputed heavyweight, Oleksandr Usyk has done what few believed possible.

Now his journey continues on TON, a chain built for culture, community and global connection. 

Together with Fuse, his story becomes something you can hold.
